articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: "Russia is a real bear": Kremlin responds to Trump's Ukraine comments - Axios
articles.description: Kremlin official suggested Trump was pushing for Europe to ditch Russian fuels to boost U.S. energy sales.
articles.content:
The Kremlin responded Wednesday to President Trump's assertion this week that Ukraine can win the war against Russia and labeling Putin's military "a paper tiger."
The big picture: Kremlin spokesper… [+174 chars]
